## Article Content

HOME
AUTOMATED FLOWS
Automated Flows

Flows is a highly flexible tool designed to automate personalized email and text messages, ensuring your clients receive the right message at the right time.

By setting up flows based on specific trigger events, you can send tailored messages—including marketing messages—that adapt to each client’s journey.

Once your flows are set up, they run on autopilot, saving you time by sending relevant messages automatically.

Send rebooking reminders to clients

Provide custom pre and post-care instructions based on booked services

Cross-sell and upsell products, packages, and memberships

Notify your team of key events such as external form submissions

Select from pre-built flows that can be easily customized

To enable the Flows app, go to Apps > Manage apps > Flows and select Enable.

To learn more about flows:

Book a 1:1 consultation call with our team. We can help you create flows and learn more about using flows to drive more profit for your business.

Watch our on-demand Flows video.

The articles in this section cover flows, including creating flows, viewing flow statistics, and more.
